thoughts.text: We should modify the 'coin_data_downloader.py' script to use the CoinGecko API instead of web scraping. This will provide us with a more reliable and accurate source of data. We can use the 'requests' package to make API requests and retrieve the necessary data. Once we have modified the script, we can use the 'execute_python_file' command to execute the modified script and verify that the 'cryptocurrency_data.csv' file has been created.
